title: SMC_ORI_CONVENTION (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_ORI_CONVENTION :
Represents different interpretations of an orientation given by three Euler angles.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: ADDAXES
rows.Comment: A/B/C are treated as additional axes and not as an orientation;

rows.Name: ZYZ
rows.Comment: Rotation around the axes z, yâ, zââ;

rows.Name: ZYX
rows.Comment: Rotation around the axes z, yâ, xââ; also known as Yaw-Pitch-Roll;

rows.Name: XYZ
rows.Comment: Rotation around the axes x, yâ, zââ;
